lines.text: Well, you know what Mr Lincoln said - you can fool some of the people all of the time, and some of the people some of the time, but you can't *fool* some of the people some of the time.
Can't see why white men folks don't want their women folks to work. I had to git to work the minute I got married. My husband retired with the Marriage Certificate.
[laughs]
The cows haven't formed a union, have they?
I wouldn't be at all surprised.
I'm here to get the third payment on your sixth installment.
lines.character: Mr. Donovan - collector for Acme Furniture

lines.text: I'm not going to get that.
It won't do any good. The florist always rings twice.
What you are sitting on does not belong to you.
lines.character: Mr. Donovan - collector for Acme Furniture

lines.text: Hey genius, do you imbibe?
No, but i'll have a drink.
lines.character: Mr. Donovan - collector for Acme Furniture

lines.text: Six o'clock! And the warehouse closes at five. If we hurry, we can just make it. Let's go boys.
lines.character: Mr. Donovan - collector for Acme Furniture

lines.text: We're married you know.
Well, that certainly takes a load off my mind.
Nothing can touch us on this day. The gods are with us.
Yeah, but the red light's against us.
After all, what do you get by walking the primrose path? Primroses.
[When given a stick to use as a riding crop.]
I like this. Brings out the wife-beater in me.
Without my wife, I'm comparatively alone in the world. Even with my wife, I'm comparatively alone in the world.
When a dame gets you going, keep right on going!
I'm swell at groping.
I imagined you were the type!
